element.name: domainName
element.short_description: Domain
element.long_description: (Only for Windows monitoring station) Enter domain name.

element.name: port
element.short_description: Agent Port
element.long_description: (Only for Linux monitoring station) Enter the port that up.time Agent is listening on.

element.name: userName
element.short_description: Username
element.long_description: (Only for Windows monitoring station) Enter User/Administrator name.

element.name: password
element.short_description: Password
element.long_description: On Windows monitoring station, the password is for running a remote Powershell script. On Linux monitoring station, the password is for up.time Agent on a remote Windows host.
